title: Dubai City Explorer - 4 Days
description: Discover the modern marvels and traditional charm of Dubai in this comprehensive 4-day city tour. Experience iconic landmarks, luxury shopping, and authentic Emirati culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Modern Dubai
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, Burj Khalifa visit, Dubai Mall exploration

itinerary.title: Traditional Dubai
itinerary.description: Dubai Creek, Gold Souk, Spice Souk, Al Fahidi Historical District

itinerary.title: Dubai Marina & Beaches
itinerary.description: Dubai Marina walk, JBR Beach, Marina cruise, Palm Jumeirah visit

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Last-minute shopping, airport transfer

title: Dubai Desert Adventure - 3 Days
description: Experience the thrill of the Arabian Desert with dune bashing, camel riding, and traditional Bedouin camp experiences. Perfect for adventure seekers.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari & Camp
itinerary.description: Pickup from Dubai, dune bashing, camel ride, desert camp setup, BBQ dinner

itinerary.title: Desert Activities
itinerary.description: Sunrise photography, sandboarding, falconry show, traditional breakfast

itinerary.title: Return to Dubai
itinerary.description: Morning desert walk, return to Dubai, city drop-off

title: Dubai Luxury Experience - 5 Days
description: Indulge in the ultimate Dubai luxury experience with 5-star accommodations, private tours, fine dining, and exclusive access to premium attractions.

itinerary.title: Luxury Arrival
itinerary.description: VIP airport pickup, 5-star hotel check-in, welcome dinner at Burj Al Arab

itinerary.title: Sky High Dubai
itinerary.description: Private helicopter tour, Burj Khalifa VIP experience, luxury shopping

itinerary.title: Atlantis Experience
itinerary.description: Atlantis Resort day pass, aquarium visit, water park access, spa treatment

itinerary.title: Private Yacht & Desert
itinerary.description: Private yacht charter, luxury desert safari with private camp

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final shopping, VIP airport transfer

title: Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 5 Days
description: Experience the mystical kingdom of Mustang with a perfect combination of flight and drive. Explore ancient monasteries, dramatic landscapes, and unique Tibetan culture in the rain shadow of the Himalayas.
highlights: Flight to Jomsom with mountain views

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Early morning flight from Kathmandu to Pokhara, then scenic flight to Jomsom. Explore Jomsom bazaar and acclimatize to the altitude.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through dramatic landscapes to Charang village. Visit Charang monastery and continue to Lo Manthang, the ancient walled capital.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploration of Lo Manthang. Visit Jampa Gompa, Thubchen Gompa, and Choprang Gompa. Experience local Tibetan culture.

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom via different route. Stop at Ghami village and see the longest mani wall in Nepal.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with stunning mountain views. Connect to Kathmandu flight or extend stay in Pokhara.

title: Rara Scenic Tour by Flight & Road - 7 Days
description: Discover Nepal's largest and most beautiful alpine lake in the remote far-western region. This unique tour combines scenic flights and overland journey to explore the pristine Rara National Park.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Kathmandu to Nepalgunj. Rest and prepare for mountain flight next day.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Talcha Airport, Drive to Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Early morning scenic flight to Talcha Airport. Drive to Rara Lake through beautiful countryside.

itinerary.title: Explore Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Full day exploration around Rara Lake. Boat ride on the pristine waters, nature walks around the lake.

itinerary.title: Rara Lake Exploration
itinerary.description: Continue exploring Rara National Park. Wildlife spotting, hiking to viewpoints, photography.

itinerary.title: Rara to Talcha, Fly to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning departure from Rara Lake area to Talcha Airport. Flight back to Nepalgunj.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Nepalgunj to Kathmandu. Free time for last-minute shopping or sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to international airport for departure or extend your stay in Nepal.

title: Bardiya Wilderness Experience - 4 Days
description: Experience Nepal's best kept wildlife secret in Bardiya National Park. Enjoy thrilling jungle safaris, spot Royal Bengal tigers, one-horned rhinos, and diverse wildlife in their natural habitat.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bardiya
itinerary.description: Arrive in Bardiya National Park area. Check into jungle lodge. Evening Tharu cultural program.

itinerary.title: Full Day Jungle Safari
itinerary.description: Early morning jeep safari in search of tigers and rhinos. Afternoon elephant safari. Evening boat safari on Karnali River.

itinerary.title: Wildlife Activities
itinerary.description: Morning bird watching and nature walk. Visit Tharu village. Afternoon jungle safari with different route.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning final safari activity. Return to lodge for breakfast and checkout.

title: Chitwan Jungle Stay - 4 Days
description: Immerse yourself in the heart of Chitwan National Park with an authentic jungle stay experience. Encounter diverse wildlife including rhinos, tigers, elephants and enjoy traditional Tharu culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Tharu Culture
itinerary.description: Arrive in Chitwan and check into jungle resort. Tharu village tour. Evening Tharu cultural dance program.

itinerary.title: Jungle Safari Adventures
itinerary.description: Early morning jeep safari in core jungle area. Afternoon canoe ride on Rapti River followed by jungle walking safari.

itinerary.title: Elephant Activities and Nature Walk
itinerary.description: Morning visit to Elephant Breeding Center. Elephant safari through grasslands. Afternoon bird watching and nature walk.

itinerary.title: Final Safari and Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning final safari opportunity. Return for breakfast and checkout. Departure with unforgettable jungle memories.

title: Upper Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 6 Days
description: Journey to the forbidden kingdom of Upper Mustang, a restricted area that preserves ancient Tibetan culture and traditions. Explore medieval cities, ancient monasteries, and dramatic desert landscapes.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Pokhara, then scenic mountain flight to Jomsom. Explore Jomsom town and visit local monastery.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through the Kali Gandaki valley to Charang. Visit the impressive Charang monastery with ancient murals.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Lo Manthang's medieval architecture. Visit ancient gompas and meet with local Loba people.

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Ghar Gompa to Ghami
itinerary.description: Visit ancient Ghar Gompa and explore mysterious sky caves. Drive to Ghami village via different route.

itinerary.title: Ghami to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom through scenic Mustang landscapes. Stop at Samar village and Chele.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with spectacular mountain views. Connect to Kathmandu flight.
